metadata.title: CVE-2024-53159 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  hwmon: (nct6775-core) Fix overflows seen when writing limit attributes  DIV_ROUND_CLOSEST() after kstrtoul() results in an overflow if a large number such as 18446744073709551615 is provided by the user. Fix it by reordering clamp_val() and DIV_ROUND_CLOSEST() operations.
